org.meganekkovr

クラス SurfaceRendererComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.meganekkovr.Component
      • org.meganekkovr.SurfaceRendererComponent

  • public class SurfaceRendererComponent
extends Component
    This gives appearance to Entity for rendering. Surface can be defined with Drawable, View, or Bitmap. You can use Canvas to render custom drawings. getSurfaceTexture() or getSurface() are usefull if you wish to render video or camera images with MediaPlayer or Camera.

      • setContinuousUpdate

        public void setContinuousUpdate(boolean continuousUpdate)
        Call this to update internal SurfaceTexture on every frame update. Typically used when rendering video with MediaPlayer.
        パラメータ:
        continuousUpdate - true to update texture automatically on frame update. default is false.

      • getOpacity

        public float getOpacity()
        Get actual opacity for rendering. This value is inherited from parent Entity.
        戻り値:
        Actual opacity for rendering
